short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse privately and block trackers with our Simple Tracker Blocker extension. Protect your online privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your online privacy with our Simple Tracker Blocker extension. We are committed to providing you with a 100% anonymous browsing experience. We do not access or collect any of your data. Your online activities remain private and secure. Browse with confidence, knowing that your online activities are shielded from unwanted tracking and that your data is kept private. Try our Simple Tracker Blocker today and regain control over your online privacy.
